channel.title: Softlayer_location_root on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_location_root on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Location_Root
item.description: SoftLayer_Location_Root Datatype Description SoftLayer_Location_Root extends the [[SoftLayer_Location]] data type to include root-specific properties. seeAlso SoftLayer_Location (type) Local id The unique identifier of a specific location. Type: integer longName A longer location description. Type: string name A short location description. Type: string statusId Type: integer Relational activePresaleEvents Type: SoftLayer_Sales_Presale_Event[]
